Class VServer

java.lang.Object
  VServer
public class VServer
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Ashwin,Avijit,Sumedh,Hemendra This is main Server of the VChat. Its create the server for message transfer, file transfer and reply of file transfer,and continously check for clients to join the server Whenever one gets join,it creates ServerSendsMessages,ServerTakesMessages and ServerForFileTransfer threads separately for each user
